data.title: BLACK JACQUARD BLAZER
data.description: Elevate your wardrobe with this Black Jacquard Blazer, where classic meets contemporary. Crafted with a subtle jacquard pattern, it offers just the right amount of texture and refinement, making it perfect for evening occasions or smart-casual settings. Tailored to perfection, this blazer exudes sophistication while providing a comfortable fit. Pair it with tailored trousers or dark jeans for an effortlessly stylish look.

data.title: Green Cotton Knitted Shirt
data.description: Add some extra comfort to your 9-to-5 wardrobe with our new cotton shirt. Knitted from a jersey fabrication made with cotton, it prioritises durability and flexibility while maintaining a formal look, courtesy of the cutaway collar. Wear it with anything from smart-casual chinos to your best two-piece suit.

data.title: Red Logo Text Print Cotton Polo
data.description: Elevate your casual wardrobe with this Red Logo Text Print Cotton Polo. Crafted from premium cotton, this polo offers a refined yet slim fit, perfect for any occasion. The subtle logo text print adds a touch of sophistication, while the classic polo design ensures timeless style. Ideal for those who appreciate understated elegance, this piece effortlessly combines comfort with class.

data.title: Red Logo Text Print Cotton Polo
data.description: Elevate your casual wardrobe with this Red Logo Text Print Cotton Polo. Crafted from premium cotton, this polo offers a refined yet slim fit, perfect for any occasion. The subtle logo text print adds a touch of sophistication, while the classic polo design ensures timeless style. Ideal for those who appreciate understated elegance, this piece effortlessly combines comfort with class.

data.title: Green Overshirt
data.description: Introducing our laidback overshirt, a must-have for embracing lighter, happier days. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this overshirt boasts a classic shirt collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, exuding timeless sophistication. Its press stud fastening ensures effortless wear, while chest pockets add a touch of utility. Unlined for breathability, this overshirt features a straight hem and a loose fit, offering both style and comfort in equal measure. Treated for a soft feel and comfortable wear, it effortlessly elevates any ensemble. Embrace the opportunity to dress with ease and elegance in our versatile overshirt. The main material in this product contains a minimum of 50% TENCEL™ branded lyocell fibres, high quality cellulose fibres made from wood pulp from sustainably managed forests and produced in a way that reduces environmental impact.

data.title: Navy Blue Linen Check Suit-Set Blazer
data.description: Men's navy blue check blazer from SELECTED HOMME. Made from premium linen-cotton blend fabric for a comfortable fit and feel. Cut in a slim fit and features a classic double button placket, front welt pockets, and a pocket square pocket. Pair it with our matching tailored trousers for a complete suit-set look.

data.title: Brown Check Print Cotton Shirt
data.description: Men's brown check printed Cotton Shirt from SELECTED HOMME.

data.title: Royal Blue Slim Fit Suit-Set Blazer
data.description: This classic tailoring blazer by SELECTED will add a sophisticated edge to your wardrobe. Crafted from a luxurious fabric, this timeless piece features notch lapels and subtle stitching for an elegant finish. Style it over a white shirt and our matching trousers for a suave office look or pair it with jeans and ankle boots for an effortless casual ensemble.

data.title: Green Embroidered Print T-shirt
data.description: Spice up your basics with this embroidered T-shirt from SELECTED Homme. Crafted from super soft and breathable organic cotton, it makes for the perfect summer staple. Wear it with denim, a bomber jacket, and trainers. This product is made with organic cotton. Organic cotton is grown without the use of harmful chemicals. Organic cotton farming protects natural resources and biodiversity.

data.title: Brown Organic Cotton Check Shirt
data.description: Introducing a staple for your everyday wardrobe: the Classic Long Sleeve Shirt. Crafted with meticulous detail, this shirt features a traditional shirt collar and buttoned cuffs, ensuring timeless elegance. Its regular fit offers comfort and versatility, perfect for any occasion. Complete with a button fastening and a curved hem, this piece effortlessly blends sophistication with everyday ease. Ideal for those who appreciate quality and style in their attire.

data.title: Black Printed Crew Neck T-shirt
data.description: Introducing our meticulously crafted Organic Cotton Crew Neck T-Shirt, tailored with sophistication for the modern man. Elevate your wardrobe with its sleek design, featuring a captivating front graphic print that adds a touch of personality to your ensemble. Designed with comfort in mind, its short sleeves offer ease of movement while maintaining a refined silhouette. Embrace both style and sustainability with our slim fit tee, made from premium organic cotton for a luxurious feel against the skin.

data.title: Light Blue Suit-Set Blazer
data.description: Elevate your wardrobe with our distinguished single-breasted blazer, a perfect blend of wool and linen for year-round sophistication. Its breathable and flexible fabric ensures comfort, while the unique shawl lapel adds a touch of refined elegance. The blazer features long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a welted chest pocket, and jetted front pockets with flaps. Half-lined for a sleek fit, it’s designed in a slim silhouette, making it an impeccable choice for any occasion. Complete the look with our matching trousers, a printed shirt, and suede loafers for a truly polished ensemble.
